Key Match Events: Joel Embiid became involved in a physical altercation with a local columnist in the team's locker room post-game after a loss to the Memphis Grizzlies.
Pre-Game Insights: The tensions are high with this Sixers team as the losses pile up, the games go by without Embiid or Paul George on the court, and the fans become increasingly fed up with the explanation or lack thereof from the organization.
Post-Match Reflections: Joel Embiid made it clear that he was aware of the article on Friday following the team's practice, in which Embiid alluded to the columnist, commented on his absence from the practice, and then continued on making his feelings on the article clear.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NBA will be investigating the matter further, making it the second time in this young season that the league has investigated the Philadelphia 76ers.
Others: Joel Embiid was involved in a verbal back and forth with the columnist before the altercation, saying "Don't ever put my dead brother's name in your mouth. Don't talk about my family. Don't bring them into this."
